name: ch.mystrom.smarthome
description: This app provides support for the following devices:

scripts.info:
npm run -s _homeyRun -- info && exit; printf "[Homey-App] 	 $npm_package_name 
 Version: 	 v$npm_package_version 
 Description: 	 $npm_package_description 
 Host: 		 ${HOSTNAME} 

Environment variables:

 "
scripts.test: npm run -s _homeyRun -- test && exit; athom app run
scripts.install: npm run -s _homeyRun -- install && exit; athom app install
scripts.build: npm run -s _homeyRun -- build && exit; athom app build && npm run init:app
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:patch && exit; npm run _dbuild -- patch && npm run _release && athom app publish
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:minor && exit; npm run _dbuild -- minor && npm run _release && athom app publish
scripts.deploy:major: npm run -s _homeyRun -- deploy:major && exit; npm run _dbuild -- major && npm run _release && athom app publish
scripts.init:app: npm run -s _homeyRun -- init:app && exit; npm init --quiet -y 1>/dev/null
scripts.createRepo: npm run -s _homeyRun -- createRepo && exit; hub create -d "$npm_package_description" -h $npm_package_homepage $npm_package_name && npm run init:app
scripts._release: git checkout master && git pull && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push origin v$npm_package_version
scripts._dbuild: func() { athom app version $1 && npm run init:app && npm run __dbuild && git push origin master; }; func

author: Chris Gross <cgHome@gmx.net>
